pages.text: The $(item)Basic Generator$() generates Zaps using furnace fuel. The longer a fuel would burn, the more Zaps it makes.
For every 1 item a fuel would smelt, it generates 2,000⚡.$(br2)For example, Coal smelts 8 items and generates 16,000⚡.$(br2)As the Generator only outputs at 10⚡/t, it is LV.
